text: Maksim Aleksandrovich Kuzmin (; born 1 June 1996) is a Russian professional football player. He plays as a central midfielder for FC Baltika Kaliningrad. ==Club career== He made his professional debut on 30 May 2015 for FC Dynamo Moscow in a Russian Premier League game against FC Krasnodar.
